movie.title: Iron Man & Captain America: Heroes United
movie.headline: Iron Man (Adrian Pasdar) and Captain America (Roger Craig Smith) must prevent Red Skull (Liam O'Brien) and Taskmaster (Clancy Brown) from destroying the world.
